assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: This study was performed under Human Research Ethics Committee (HREC) (Medical) certificate number M180506, from the Faculty of Health Science, University of the Witwatersrand. This study was performed in line with the principles of the Declaration of Helsinki.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The ethics certificate (M180506) under which this study was performed allows for anonymized retrospective internal reviews to be performed without consent.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare no competing interests.
